channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Nikita Podlozhniy

item.title: Customer Feedback Analysis in Python
item.description: Background Every company has always taken pride in providing excellent customer service, therefore it’s crucial as part of ongoing improvements for product to collect and analyse feedback after each customer interaction on support channels A top-notch analyst in Hi-Tech industry should be in capable of handle at least base feedback analysis quickly and efficiently and going through this article you will be introduced with the necessary concepts and eventually given the base guide on how to unlock the true power of text data
